description: Draw bounding boxes around all figures, tables, and headers in this document.

pdf_content.text:
Annual Report 2024

Executive Summary

This year we achieved significant growth across all sectors. Revenue increased by 25% compared to the previous year.

[Figure 1: Revenue Growth Chart]

Our team expanded to 500 employees across 10 offices worldwide.

[Table 1: Regional Performance]
Region | Revenue | Growth
North America | $50M | +30%
Europe | $35M | +20%
Asia Pacific | $25M | +35%

Conclusion

We remain committed to sustainable growth and innovation.

description: Identify and mark all section headers and figures in this research paper.

pdf_content.text:
Machine Learning for Natural Language Processing

Abstract

This paper surveys recent advances in machine learning approaches for NLP tasks.

1. Introduction

Natural language processing has seen remarkable progress...

[Figure 2: NLP Pipeline Architecture]

2. Methods

We evaluate three main approaches...

3. Results

[Table 2: Model Comparison]
Model | Accuracy | F1 Score
BERT | 92.5% | 0.91
GPT-3 | 94.2% | 0.93
T5 | 93.8% | 0.92

4. Conclusion

Our analysis shows that transformer models excel at NLP tasks.

pdf_content.text:
User Guide v2.0

Getting Started

Follow these steps to set up your account:

[Figure 3: Setup Wizard Screenshot]

Step 1: Create an account
Step 2: Verify your email
Step 3: Complete your profile

Configuration Options

[Table 3: Settings Overview]
Setting | Default | Description
Theme | Light | UI color scheme
Language | English | Interface language
Notifications | On | Email alerts

Troubleshooting

[Figure 4: Error Message Guide]

Contact support@example.com for help.
